attributes.action: Call an immediate election in light of recent revelations on expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole of parliament has lost moral authority over the revelations on expenses, and therefore, the PM should call an immediate election so the people can send in a new government with a new mandate!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
